Project Title.question: What is the title of your project?

Concept Summary.question: What is the main concept of your project and what problem does it solve?
Concept Summary.answer: An intelligent form processing system that helps users provide better-quality responses through AI-powered suggestions and real-time feedback.

Target Audience.question: Who is the target audience for your project and what are their needs?
Target Audience.answer: Developers and project managers who need to document their project ideas thoroughly and effectively.

Key Features.question: What are the main features or functionalities of your application?
answer: AI-powered response suggestions for better quality answers
Load existing responses for review or updates
Detailed logging for tracking form interactions

Technical Approach.question: How do you plan to implement your project technically?
Technical Approach.answer: Using Python with JSON for data storage, integrating with Ollama API for AI suggestions, and implementing real-time logging for system monitoring.

Expected Challenges.question: What challenges do you anticipate and how will you address them?
Expected Challenges.answer: Managing AI response quality and relevance, handling network issues gracefully, and ensuring data persistence throughout the form filling process.

Submission Format.question: How will you present your final submission?
Submission Format.answer: My complete JSON document containing all form responses, along with metadata about the AI model used and timestamps.

Expected Outcome.question: What are your goals for this project?
Expected Outcome.answer: To create an intuitive form processing system that helps users provide comprehensive and well-thought-out responses through AI assistance.

Additional Notes.question: Do you have any additional information to add?
Additional Notes.answer: The system includes real-time logging and the ability to save progress at any time by typing 'SAVE'.
